name: real-world-data-marketplace
description: Full-stack monorepo for Real-World Data Marketplace for AI Agents

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run install:hardhat
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.deploy:local: cd hardhat && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network localhost
scripts.deploy:mumbai: cd hardhat && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network mumbai
